name: Dark Souls: Remastered
overview: Then, there was fire. Re-experience the critically acclaimed, genre-defining game that started it all. Beautifully remastered, return to Lordran in stunning high-definition detail running at 60fps. Dark Souls Remastered includes the main game plus the Artorias of the Abyss DLC. This marks the franchises debut on a Nintendo platform, and for the first time ever can be played on-the-go with Nintendo Switch.
